titles.title: We Need To Have A High Perspective

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Living each day in the palm of the Master's hand,
Letting the Holy Spirit guide us in His way.
Looking at each situation with God's divine insight,
And rising above on eagles' wings.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We need to rise on eagles' wings
Soaring over the earth in the heavenlies.
We need to rise on eagles' wings
Getting the Father's perspective on life and things.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We need to have a high perspective of the life we live,
Getting our heads up out of the sand.
Living each day as the Father above has planned for us,
And rising above on eagles' wings.
